name: Grim Weeper
description:
is a story questgame, there you play the little reapi. He is a young innocent Reaper, that is not simply a reaper. He dont want to kill the chosen souls or be responsible for their death. But the clue in this game is the fact, that ypur master, the Great Grim Reaper give you the order to collect the souls. So its on your decision, kill the poor souls or safe theire lives. Look arround, talk to the living and find a way for your playstyle.

Controllls :

WASD or Joystik - Move

E or Southbutton - Interact

So have fun :)
